page.title: 04Schools
page.content: {Wolviston Primary School { The original Wolviston School was completed on July 20th.1877.When it was first built the whole school was just one classroom.Now we have four classrooms. The children at the school are aged from four years to eleven years.We have a Head Teacher and four Teachers.This year there are eighty children at our school. Our subjects at school are: Mathematics,Language,Science,Art&Craft Environmental Studies and Physical Education. We have a BBC Computer and enjoy writing our own programs using colour and graphics.
